content: ttttwwwwiiiinnnnkkkklllleeee tttthhhheeee hhhhoooorrrrsssseeee materials worsted weight yarn i use red heart super saver - approx 85 yds main color mc - approx 7 yds contrasting color cc size h crochet hook note the size of hook and yarn yardage may vary depending on what yarn you use black yarn to embroider nose and eyebrows black felt & black thread for eyes darning & sewing needles poly-fil or similar stuffing plastic pellets & scrap fabric optional i use poly-pellets stitch marker optional finished measurements the finished horse stands approximately 7 high depending on the yarn and hook used abbreviations used chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet yarn over and insert hook into stitch draw up a loop yarn over and draw through all three loops on hook double_crochet = double_crochet decrease = single_crochet 2 together insert hook into stitch and draw up a loop insert hook into next stitch and draw up a loop yarn over draw through all 3 loops on hook © 2008 hooked on fauna all rights reserved - 1 - twinkle the horse instructions note most rounds are not joined you may wish to use a stitch marker to mark beginning of rounds head with main color mc chain 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round only round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 4 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 30 single_crochet round 6 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 36 single_crochet round 7 single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 42 single_crochet round 8 & 9 single_crochet in each single_crochet 42 single_crochet round 10 single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet decrease around 36 single_crochet round 11 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet decrease around 30 single_crochet round 12 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet decrease around 24 single_crochet round 13 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease around 18 single_crochet round 14 single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease around 12 single_crochet stuff head with poly-fil or similar stuffing round 15 decrease around 6 single_crochet leave 18 tail to sew head shut fasten_off sew head shut note keep stitches tight in rnds 12 15 to prevent small gaps from forming body with mc chain 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round only round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 4 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 30 single_crochet round 6 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet
